snippet.title: Fire Tonight - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Fire Tonight is a narrative puzzle game set in 1990 following a couple’s quest to reunite in a city on fire.

Inspired by Information Society's song of the same name, Fire Tonight is a lighthearted but thoughtful walk through the story of a relationship. A story about believing in each other when the whole world tries to keep them apart.

Coming in early 2021, to Nintendo Switch and Steam (PC and Mac)

Add to your wishlist on steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1188900/Fire_Tonight/
